code: import{Button}from"@mui/material";import{Typography}from"@mui/material";import{Box}from"@mui/material";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useNavigate}from"react-router";import{handleAmountChange,handleScoreChange}from"../redux/Actions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FinalScreen=()=>{const{amount_of_questions,score}=useSelector(state=>state);const dispatch=useDispatch();const history=useNavigate();const handleBackToSettings=()=>{dispatch(handleScoreChange(0));dispatch(handleAmountChange(50));history("/");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{mt:30,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",mb:3,children:"You finished the quiz!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h3",fontWeight:"bold",mb:3,children:["Final Score ",score,"/",amount_of_questions]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleBackToSettings,variant:"contained",size:"large",children:"Back to settings!"})]});};export default FinalScreen;
